original_title: 怪奇!アンビリーバブル２
overview: Ms. M (female, pseudonym) is plagued by a spiritual phenomenon, and holds a memorial service for what appears to be a psychic photograph, which is thought to be the cause, but the mysterious phenomenon only intensifies instead of subsiding. And she has the same shade as the photo that was supposed to be a memorial service again in the photo she took recently...! !
tagline: Approaching the mystery of spirit photography!
title: Kaiki Unbelievable 2
